title: Amexio Nav Bar
description: The Nav Bar Component is a familiar top navigation pattern for users. Nav bar has Logo/Title left align, than link, text field, button and menus on right side. v4.1 Nav bar is not backward compatible of v4.0.

gridData.name: title
gridData.description: Title of navbar.

gridData.name: logo
gridData.description: Logo of navbar.

gridData.name: enable-side-nav-position
gridData.description: Indicate if side-nav-bar is present

gridData.name: color
gridData.description: Provides color to the navigation menus

gridData.name: transparent
gridData.description: If true, sets the transparent nav bar

gridData.name: position-center
gridData.description: Show the content in center. <amexio-nav-item position-center></amexio-nav-item>.

gridData.name: position-left
gridData.description: Show the content left side .<amexio-nav-item position-left></amexio-nav-item>.

gridData.name: position-right
gridData.description: Show the content right side. <amexio-nav-item position-right></amexio-nav-item>.

gridData.name: type
gridData.description: Indicate the type of menu-items (link / button / textfield /menu/menucontainer ) For Advance development use (menucontainer) for custom dropdown menu you can used in navbar.

gridData.name: title
gridData.description: Title for link, button and menu header

gridData.name: icon
gridData.description: Icon for link, button and menu header

gridData.name: data
gridData.description: Standard JSON format array data which is used for rendering menus. This is used when type=menu is defined.

gridData.name: data
gridData.description: Standard JSON format array data which is used for rendering menus. This is used when type=menu is defined.

gridData.name: sub-menu-height-padding
gridData.description: provides padding for the sub node of navbar

gridData.name: display-key
gridData.description: Display Key provides the user defined key to parent json (parent key name can be changed)

gridData.name: onNavLogoClick
gridData.description: Fire when nav bar logo is clicked

gridData.name: onNavTitleClick
gridData.description: Fire when title is clicked

gridData.name: onNavItemClick
gridData.description: Fire when nav item is clicked, This event is fired when nav item type is defined as 'link/button/menu'

gridData.name: color-palette
gridData.description: classic/ vibrant/ random/ specific (vibrant: amexio-theme-color1)

gridData.name: gradient
gridData.description: If true
